shortdesc.ph: Opens a media resource and configures playback.
Opens a media resource and configures playback settings.
Opens a media resource and sets playback options.
Opens a media resource and configures playback settings.

section.p: This method allows you to open different types of media resources, including custom media files, and configure playback.
This method allows you to open different types of media resources, including custom media files, and configure playback settings.
This method allows you to open different types of media resources, including custom media files, and configure playback settings.
This method allows you to open different types of media resources, including custom media files, and configure playback settings.
section.note: This method is asynchronous. To play the media file, call the method after receiving the callback with status PlayerStateOpenCompleted.
This method is asynchronous. To play the media file, call the method after receiving the callback with the state PlayerStateOpenCompleted.
This method is asynchronous. To play the media file, call the method after receiving the callback reporting the state playerStateOpenCompleted.
This method is asynchronous. To play the media file, you need to call the method after receiving the callback reporting the PLAYER_STATE_OPEN_COMPLETED state.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p:
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
